step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Great job completing the first roll! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull back.
Second rep starting well. Maintain a comfortable posture.
Excellent control. Continue to focus on the circular motion of your shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish to the second roll! You're doing great with the shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when pulling your shoulders back to help with breathing and lymphatic flow.
